name: Classroom - Scene 1
description: Supporting a Youth in Crisis - Room 1 - Check in with your classmates
hints: There are three other students in the class, maybe talking to them will help?
Maybe I should try to talk to Skylar, how should I get their attention?
What's that picture on the wall? It looks like someone waving...

In order to solve this room, you need to get Skylar's attention. The correct answer to get their attention is "wave". The picture in the room mentions that waving is a great way to get someone's attention, and this is indeed correct.
